articles.description: Manchester City's visit to Goodison Park to face Everton on Monday has been postponed due to COVID-19, the clubs have confirmed.
articles.content:
Manchester City's visit to Goodison Park to face Everton in the Premier League on Monday has been postponed due to COVID-19, the clubs have confirmed.

articles.description: Getafe president Angel Torres has confirmed the club's interest in Barcelona midfielder Carles Alena and Real Madrid winger Takefusa Kubo.
